1496460.name: Ambient Channels: Scene Director Unlock
1496460.description:
Want to edit scenes in Ambient Channel episodes to make your own? Get the Scene Director Unlock DLC to use our upcoming editor tools to build your own scenes including lighting and custom camera tracks.

Notes:
Episodes range in ability to customize, some episodes are modular and can be rebuilt from the ground up to your spec and some episodes can only have prop changes due to performance optimizations.

We will attempt to keep the editing system as stable as possible, but it's in early development and may have bugs or other issues including having to recreate scenes in the future if we have to change our save system. (We plan to have this fleshed out before release, as we use these new editors as well, but want to be transparent at the potential issue)

Additional features will be added during early access, including building sharing your scenes through the workshop and inviting people to your scenes during multiplayer sessions. By the end of early access, if you have the game modes unlock as well, you'll be able to setup your own treasure hunt and other games.

Note: This feature is in development and planned to release in Winter 2022, please only purchase if you'd like to support development. When the tool is released, we'll create a discount bundle with the .
